com.informatics.lehigh.cardboardarlibrary

Class Cube

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.Vector<es.ava.aruco.Marker>
          • com.informatics.lehigh.cardboardarlibrary.Cube
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<es.ava.aruco.Marker>, java.util.Collection<es.ava.aruco.Marker>, java.util.List<es.ava.aruco.Marker>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class Cube
extends java.util.Vector<es.ava.aruco.Marker>
    Created by Josiah Smith on 6/30/2016. Class representing a cube consisting of 6 different markers Cubes have some benefits over a single marker: -Increased Rotation and Translation Accuracy -More Consistent detection -360 degrees of detection
    See Also:

                                           double paddingSizeMeters,
                                           CubeConfiguration conf)
        Create a Mat of the cube image
        Parameters:
        markerSizeMeters - size of each marker
        paddingSizeMeters - the size of the padding of each marker
        conf - The configuration of the cube
        Returns:
        Mat of the cube image
